ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
================
First, special thanks for the idea and some starter code to:
http://robinelvin.wordpress.com/2009/09/04/saml-with-django/

Thanks to Steve Moitozo II and the Polder Consortium for advice.

Thanks to Olav Morken for the invaluable SAML Tracer.
    Firefox Plugin: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/saml-tracer/
    Source code: https://github.com/UNINETT/SAML-tracer

Thanks to the simpleSAMLphp team for a fairly easy-to-use implementation.
